text: Banri Kaieda is a Japanese politician who has served as the Vice Speaker of the House of Representatives of Japan since 2021. He was born in 1949 in Tokyo and went to Keio University. He was the leader of the Democratic Party of Japan from 2012 to 2014. ==Other websites== *Profile Category:Living people Category:1949 births Category:Politicians from Tokyo Category:Ministers of economy, trade and industry of Japan
title: Banri Kaieda
